title: Common Phrases: Actions (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Actions subcategory within Common Phrases. Includes 3 card(s).

cards.romaji: Oya ga kodomo no o-shiri wo tatakimashta.
cards.japanese: 親が子供のお尻を叩きました。

cards.english: To put lipstick on one's mouth.
